mapper.select: /* USE : SystemEmpMapper.getSystemEmpDtlInfo */ SELECT tce.EMP_NO, tce.EMP_NM, tce.WEB_USE_YN, wtcn.NMCODE_NM AS WEB_USE_YN_NM, tce.USER_ID, tce.MP_NO, tce.SMS_RECV_YN, stcn.NMCODE_NM AS SMS_RECV_YN_NM, tce.SERVICE_FG, vtcn.NMCODE_NM AS SERVICE_FG_NM, tce.ADMIN_FG, atcn.NMCODE_NM AS ADMIN_FG_NM, tca.AGENCY_CD, tca.AGENCY_NM, tce.MAP_EMP_NO, tce.USE_YN, utcn.NMCODE_NM AS USE_YN_NM, tce.REMARK FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce, TB_CM_NMCODE wtcn, TB_CM_NMCODE stcn, TB_CM_NMCODE vtcn, TB_CM_NMCODE atcn, TB_CM_NMCODE utcn, TB_CM_AGENCY tca WHERE tce.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND wtcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND wtcn.NMCODE_CD = tce.WEB_USE_YN AND stcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '072' AND stcn.NMCODE_CD = tce.SMS_RECV_YN AND vtcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '007' AND vtcn.NMCODE_CD = tce.SERVICE_FG AND atcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '097' AND atcn.NMCODE_CD = tce.ADMIN_FG AND utcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '067' AND utcn.NMCODE_CD = tce.USE_YN AND tca.AGENCY_CD (+)= tce.AGENCY_CD
mapper.insert: /* USE : SystemEmpMapper.insertSystemEmpInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_CM_EMPLOYEE ( AGENCY_CD, EMP_NO, EMP_NM, EMP_PWD, WEB_USE_YN, USER_ID, MP_NO, SERVICE_FG, SMS_RECV_YN, ADMIN_FG, MAP_EMP_NO, USE_YN, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{agencyCd}, #{empNo}, #{empNm}, #{empPwd}, #{webUseYn}, #{userId}, #{mpNo}, #{serviceFg}, #{smsRecvYn}, #{adminFg}, #{mapEmpNo}, #{useYn}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : SystemEmpMapper.insertWbUserInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_USER_INFO ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, AUTH_GRP_CD, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, LAST_PWD_CHG_DT, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( LOWER(#{userId}), #{userPwd}, #{authGrpCd}, 0, #{regDt}, #{webUseYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: /* USE : SystemEmpMapper.updateSystemEmpInfo */ UPDATE TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce SET tce.EMP_NM = #{empNm}, tce.WEB_USE_YN = #{webUseYn}, tce.USER_ID = #{userId}, tce.MP_NO = #{mpNo}, tce.SERVICE_FG = #{serviceFg}, tce.SMS_RECV_YN = #{smsRecvYn}, tce.ADMIN_FG = #{adminFg}, tce.MAP_EMP_NO = #{mapEmpNo}, tce.USE_YN = #{useYn}, tce.REMARK = #{remark}, tce.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tce.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE tce.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tce.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

/* USE : SystemEmpMapper.saveWbUserInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_WB_USER_INFO twui USING (SELECT tce.USER_ID FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE tce WHERE tce.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} AND tce.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) org ON (twui.USER_ID = org.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET twui.USE_YN = #{webUseYn}, twui.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, twui.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( twui.USER_ID, twui.USER_PWD, twui.AUTH_GRP_CD, twui.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, twui.USE_YN, twui.REG_DT, twui.REG_ID, twui.MOD_DT, twui.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{authGrpCd}, '0', #{webUseYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.insert: /* USE : SystemEmpMapper.insertPasswordHistory */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_PWD_CHG_HIST ( USER_ID, IDX, PRIOR_PWD, REG_IP, REG_DT, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX),0) + 1 AS MAX FROM TB_WB_PWD_CHG_HIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}), #{priorPwd}, #{regIp}, #{regDt}, #{regId} )
